Simple cryptography. 

Or, is it? 

https://mega.nz/#!0YMl1S6K!VeHBRSYNbmHRsJ0KpQogPt85CFFGTDGskQ9fzeC5QK8

3's or 16's.txt:
<code>

</code>

I used https://www.boxentriq.com/code-breaking/cipher-identifier do identify the text and it found that it's HEX.

So used this https://www.boxentriq.com/code-breaking/hex-analysis

The first decryption gave me this:

<code>So, you've discovered my secret. Keep decrypting using this method!
</code>

Then just started coping the hex part and decrypted again and again until the momment I got the flag.

Flag: CTF{U_Is_Hex_Master}
